A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The most divisive Star Wars film became the battleground for the soul of fandom and now that the dust has settled\, its easier to evaluate its glories and its flaws. It feels focused grouped to death in some respects and then widely experimental in others\, featuring some of the most exciting and heartbreaking moments in the franchise as well as a few groaners. But whatever flaws it may have\, all is forgiven in one of the greatest Deus Ex Machinas in cinematic history. There’s never been a Star Wars picture quite like this\, and if the fallout from it is any indication it will be a while before there’s another.
